thread.title: Nithiin shoots fight sequences for A..Aa
thread.title_full: Nithiin shoots fight sequences for A..Aa - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nithiin shoots fight sequences for A..Aa
text:
The shooting of Nithiin-Trivikram's forthcoming film A..Aa is progressing at a brisk pace. And as per the latest update, some heavy duty action sequences are being shot on Nithiin at Ramoji Film City. Ravi Varma has composed the stunt sequences.
Samantha and Anupama Parameswaran are the female leads in the film, while Nadiya will be seen in an important role.
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
